com.topcoder.rules.engine
Class RulesEngineInterface

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.topcoder.rules.engine.RulesEngineInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
RulesConstants
public class RulesEngineInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements RulesConstants

This class is an interface to the RulesEngine.

See Also:
RulesEngine, RulesEngineHome

Constructor Detail

RulesEngineInterface

public RulesEngineInterface(long ruleSetID,
                            boolean create)
                     throws RemoteException
Constructs a new interface to the RulesEngine for the given RuleSet.

Parameters:
ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
create - Whether or not to create the RulesEngine if it does not already exist
Throws:
RemoteException - if RulesEngineHome cannot get a handle to the RulesEngine

the Exception thrown while attempting to create the Variable or null if the Variable was created successfuly

executeRule

public java.io.Serializable executeRule(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.util.Map params)
                                 throws RemoteException
Executes the Rule with the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the Rule
params - The parameters to be passed into the Rule
Returns:
The return value of the Rule. If the return value is void, then null is returned.
Throws:
RemoteException - if the connection to the RulesEngine was lost

hardRestart

public boolean hardRestart()
                    throws RemoteException
Restarts the RulesEngine.

The restarted RulesEngine will not retain the same Variable values as it had before it was restarted.

Returns:
true if the RulesEngine was restarted, false if restart was aborted due to error or the RulesEngine was not already running
Throws:
RemoteException - if the connection to the RulesEngine was lost

softRestart

public boolean softRestart()
                    throws RemoteException
Restarts the RulesEngine.

The restarted RulesEngine will retain the same Variable values as it had before it was restarted.

Returns:
true if the RulesEngine was restarted, false if restart was aborted due to error or the RulesEngine was not already running
Throws:
RemoteException - if the connection to the RulesEngine was lost

getVariables

public Variable[] getVariables()
                        throws RemoteException
Gets all the Variables in the RuleSet.

Returns:
the Variables
Throws:
RemoteException - if the connection to the RulesEngine was lost or if there was a Problem getting the Variables
